revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Atrust |model=t62 |revision=(Rev D) |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |pcb_id=50-T6200000-30 |type=thin client |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TMX320 (DM8148);TMX320DM8148CCYE1, DaVinci Digital Media Processor; |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F4G08U0D-SCB0 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB128M16HP-CG |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211E |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL852G;;1;,,, HDMI Transmitter;Lattice Semiconductor;Sil9022A;;1;,,, Triple 10-bit 180-MSPS Graphics and Video DAC;TI;THS8136;;1;,,, Low Power Stereo Audio Codec;Texas Instruments;TLV320AIC3106;;1;,,, DDR Termination Regulator;Global Mixed-mode Technology;G2997;;1;,,, 3A 23V 340kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8250;;2;,,, 30V 12.5A N-Channel Power MOSFET;Advanced Power;AP9408AGM;;1;,,, 30V 13.3A N-Channel Power MOSFET;Advanced Power;AP0903GM;;1;,,, Dual Positive-Edge-Triggered D-Type Flip-Flop;TI;SN74AHC74;;1;,,, Power Management Unit with DC/DC Controller;TI;TPS659113;;1;,,, Hex Buffer/Driver with Open-Drain Outputs;TI;SN74LVC07A;;1;,,, 2.5-3V Low-Voltage 8-bit FET Bus Switch;TI;SN74CB3Q3245;;1; |flags=DVI-I, DVI-D, Audio in/out (3.5mm), power switch, heatsink |oui_eth=00:1F:D8 }} {{TagLine|Atrust t62 Thin Client}} :[https://www.atrustcorp.com/product/index/path/146_148/id/30/language/en_us.html Product page]
"50-T6200000-30", "Rev:D", and "T62" are silkscreened on board bottom.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Texas Instruments]] TMX320 (DM8148) @1.0GHz :ARM (Cortex-A8), 256KB L2 cache with [https://www.ti.com/ds_dgm/images/fbd_sprs647e.gif ''Neon'' FPU] *GPU: PowerVR SGX530 (OpenGL ES2.0, OpenCL 1.1) *Video: DVI-I Dual Link, DVI-D Dual Link ports *Storage: [[Samsung]] 512MB (SLC NAND) Flash *Memory: [[Nanya]] 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE port *USB: 4x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 5V/3A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> Atrust t62 Top.jpeg|Board Top Atrust t62 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
